>
MUTUAL SETTLEMENT AGREEMENT
On 16th of September 2024, the following Agreement was concluded by and
between:
1. TIBIEL EOOD, Private company registered under the laws of Republic of
Bulgaria with registration number Nº 106588084 in the Commercial register and
register of NPLE, having seat and management address at: Republic of Bugaria,
City of Pernik, 70 Krakra Str., represented by Dimityr Jordanov Ivanov as first
party
2. LIFOND INVESTMENT LIMITED, Private company registered in Cyprus under
registration number No HE 332787, with address: Nicosia, 2560, Agia Varvara,
Prosfygon Nº 4, Cyprus, represented by Alackon Limited, No HE 361492 -
company and its director Ala Antoniou as second party and
3. BUL ENERGY CONSULTANT, a company established and registered under the
laws of United Arab Emirates, with Professional License No. 967160 and VAT
Nº104171282700003, having seat and management address at Office No. 901,
Business Bay, P.O.Box 29904, Dubai, United Arab Emirates, represented by
Mustafa Sami Mustafa Ammouri, as third party
the present agreement was signed for the settlement of mutual duties up to the amount
of 310 080 / three hundred and ten thousand and eighty/ euros, and the parties noted
and agreed on the following:
Art. 1. TIBIEL EOOD owes to LIFOND INVESTMENT LIMITED an amount of 310 080 /
three hundred and ten thousand and eighty/ euros, representing a distributed dividend
according to the Protocol of the sole owner of the capital dated 13.09.2024.
Art. 2. LIFOND INVESTMENT LIMITED owes to BUL ENERGY CONSULTANT an amount
of 310 080 / three hundred and ten thousand and eighty/ euros, partial payment according
to the Agreement for cooperation and confidentiality between LIFOND INVESTMENT
LIMITED and BUL ENERGY CONSULTANT for the management of activities from 3th of
April 2023.
In view of the above, TIBIEL EOOD, LIFOND INVESTMENT LIMITED and BUL
ENERGY CONSULTANT have agreed to the following:
Art. 3. TIBIEL EOOD undertakes to pay the amount due to LIFOND INVESTMENT
LIMITED in the amount of 310 080 / three hundred and ten thousand and eighty/ euros,
directly to the bank account of BUL ENERGY CONSULTANT, and the parties accept that
payment of the specified amount will discharge the obligations described above between
them up to the amount specified.
signing.
Art. 4. The agreements reached with this protocol enter into force from the day of its
-
This agreement is signed in three identical copies, one for each party.
For TIBIEL EOOD
For LIFOND INVESTMENT LIMITED
AIFOND INDA
ESTMENTS
Dimityr Jordanov Ivanov
Ala Antoniou
